creator: epugh@upstate.com
text:
I scratched my head for a while with setting print area to 1 page and doing 
header footer, so I thought I would add a short segment to the Quick Guide so 
others don't get stumped!  Also showcases how much POI can do!

Created attachment 2909
Patch file for xdoc
creator: epugh@upstate.com

text:
gentle reminder, please remember to prefix with [PATCH] --  Not trying to be a
pain, but I look at patches about 2x as frequently as bugs so chances of me
seeing it are much greater.  If you click on the little link on the home page
you'll see what I mean.

...patch appled, please cross check.  Thanks.
creator: poi-support@buni.org
